name: Ice Age: The Great Egg-Scapade
summary:
复活节电视特辑，前半部分是曼尼，迪亚哥和希德找蛋蛋的故事，后半部分是冰河世纪的彩蛋大合集。
Ice Age: The Great Egg-Scapade is an upcoming 2016 American computer-animated television special, produced by Blue Sky Studios and directed by Ricardo Cutis. It is scheduled to premiere on Fox during the Easter season.
　　The special centers on a harried prehistoric bird mom Ethel (Henson) who entrusts her precious, soon-to-hatch egg to Sid. When she recommends him to her neighbors – a condor mom (Williams), Cholly Bear (Iglesias) and Gladys Glypto (Estefan) – business booms at his new egg-sitting service.
　　However, dastardly pirate bunny Squint (Green), who is seeking revenge on the herd, steals, camouflages and hides all the eggs. Once again, with Squint’s twin brother, Clint (Anderson), assisting, Manny, Diego and the rest of the gang come to the rescue and take off on a daring mission that turns into the world’s first Easter egg hunt.
